parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To notify, command, charge, entreat solemnly. From para and the base of aggelos; to transmit a message, i.e. to enjoin.

word: I have no praise to offer,
parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To praise, commend, applaud. From epi and aineo; to applaud.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.
Lesser, inferior, weaker. Neuter of comparative of heka used for that of kakos; worse; by implication, less.
Stronger, more excellent. Neuter of an alternate form of kreitton; better, i.e. Greater advantage.
